name: A bad day for harvesting
description:
It’s the year 2030 and the climate has become very unstable, making it impossible to have a properly working farm. You are the last standing farmer and it's your you to save it. You have also been affected by climate change and your movements are not as they used to be, almost as if you don’t really have control over where to go next.

You play as a farmer who needs to protect their farm, use cards to move and cards to do actions. Fully grown crops will explode and have a chance of spawning 2 crops.

There are 3 types of action cards:

  • The water bucket  makes a crop grow by 1
  • The Side net, turned nets can protect an entire line of wind from where they are placed and forward down the wind's path
  • The net covers a single crop and protects it
  • Fully grown crops will explode and add to your total score. In addition, there's a chance of spawning new crops 2 random directions

Stay alive as long as possible!
